metadata.title: 5280-1 -- Speex vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Speex incorrectly handled certain WAV files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5280-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  speex - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1 libspeexdsp-dev - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1 libspeex-dev - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1 libspeexdsp1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1 speex-doc - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1 libspeex1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1 No subscription required
